Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students trying to communicate with each other over a long distance.
The student can illustrate a string telephone that connects the two students.
The student can show how sound travels through the string to solve the problem of communication over a distance.
The student can depict that the device uses materials that are provided (like cups and string) to send or receive information.
The student can visually represent how the device helps the students communicate, reflecting the device's function.
The student can label their drawing to explain how sound travels through the string telephone.
The student can illustrate how communication at a distance is achieved through their device, showing the importance of technology in solving this problem.
